snippet.title: Brickadia Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
We're thrilled to announce the release date for Brickadia! Wishlist now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2199420/Brickadia/
All footage captured directly in-game, using builds contributed by the community!

Read our newest blog post where we go into detail about our plan to bring Brickadia to Early Access:
https://brickadia.com/blog/early-access-2023/

Subscribe & follow for the latest and greatest info:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/brickadiagame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@brickadiagame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brickadiagame/

Music composed by Erik Payton.

#brickadia #UnrealEngine #indiegame #indiedev
